official_title: To suspend until January 1, 1995, the duty on Ondansetron Hydrochloride.

summary.text: Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to suspend, through December 31, 1994, the duty on 1,2,3,9-tetrahydro-9-methyl-3-((2-methyimidazol-1-yl)methyl) carbazole-4-one hydrochloride dihydrate (ondansetron hydrochloride in bulk and dosage forms).

titles.title: To suspend until January 1, 1995, the duty on Ondansetron Hydrochloride.
